nodes.text: The YV-24 Starforged blaster rifle was a model of blaster rifle available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. It was a similar model to the YV-23 Starforged blaster rifle.
The YV-24 Starforged blaster rifle was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Acolyte's Shadow Pack.
